member.name: PLEX_READ_DATA_REQUEST
member.summary: Indicates the range of the read operation to perform and the plex from which to read.

member.name: PLEX_READ_DATA_REQUEST.ByteOffset
member.summary: The offset of the range to be read. The offset can be the virtual offset to a file or volume. File offsets should be cluster aligned and volume offsets should be sector aligned.

member.name: PLEX_READ_DATA_REQUEST.ByteLength
member.summary: The length of the range to be read. The maximum value is 64 KB.

member.name: PLEX_READ_DATA_REQUEST.PlexNumber
member.summary: The plex from which to read. A value of zero indicates the primary copy, a value of one indicates the secondary copy, and so on.
